entity.name: article
entity.query: SELECT 'travels_'+convert(varchar(100),T1.Id) as table_id,T1.UserId ,T1.ArticleName,T1.KeyWords,T1.Description,T1.Url,T1.CreateTime,T1.UpdateTime,T1.CoverImage,T2.Content,T1.Company from Article T1 left join ArticleSnaps T2 on T1.Id=T2.ArticleId
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT 'travels_'+convert(varchar(100),id) as table_id,UserId ,ArticleName,KeyWords,Description,Url,CreateTime,UpdateTime,CoverImage,Content,Company from Article where userid>1000
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT 'travels_'+convert(varchar(100),id) as table_id FROM Article WHERE userid>1000 and CreateTime > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
